sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of Triple Roller Mill for grinding and dispersing semi-solids.
sections.scope: Applicable to ointment manufacturing activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Verify that the rollers are clean and correctly positioned.
Adjust the gap between the rollers to the required setting.
Start the motor and verify the rotation of the rollers.
Feed the pre-mixed semi-solid material into the feed rollers.
Monitor the dispersion and collect the milled product from the discharge blade.
Adjust the scraper blade pressure for efficient collection.
Pass the material multiple times if higher fineness is required.
Stop the mill and clean the rollers and blade immediately after use.
Document the mill settings and batch yield.
precautions: Never attempt to clean the rollers while they are in motion.
Maintain safe distance from the nip points of the rollers.
Ensure the scraper blade is not damaged to prevent scraping errors.
Clean rollers thoroughly to prevent material hardening on surfaces.
Use appropriate tools for feeding material into the mill.
